scripts.start:level1: npm run build && npm run copyfiles:level1 && node dist/src/level1/index.js
scripts.start:level2: npm run build && npm run copyfiles:level2 && node dist/src/level2/index.js
scripts.test:integration:level1: npm run start:level1 && diff dist/src/level1/output/output.json dist/src/level1/models/expected_output.json && echo Level1 Test passed
scripts.test:integration:level2: npm run start:level2 && diff dist/src/level2/output/output.json dist/src/level2/models/expected_output.json && echo Level2 Test passed
